name: places/ChIJBbwK5FdYwokRYr_xBQkRDO4
formattedAddress: 37 W 65th St, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 37 W 65th St, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text: Mrs. Anahid is a wonderful, Bulgarian-trained concert pianist, and she runs her music school with care and grace. The teachers on her team are kind, firm, and effective. Each recital is a lovely event where happy families enjoy the progress of all the students. 5 Stars!

text.text: Mrs. Anahid is a wonderful, Bulgarian-trained concert pianist, and she runs her music school with care and grace. The teachers on her team are kind, firm, and effective. Each recital is a lovely event where happy families enjoy the progress of all the students. 5 Stars!

originalText.text:
I have been taking piano lessons from Anahid since Oct 2018. I came to her with a clear goal of getting admission into university piano performance program, and Anahid has been a great help since the very first lesson. She is very experienced in RCM programs and was guiding me through the audition requirements and helped me selected the audition repertoires. I feel very lucky that I found her to be my teacher. Every lesson was a fruitful session with a great deal of fun.
Being an adult student with some piano training when I was a teen, I was able to play to a certain level but not confident with my technical skills and analytical skills. Anahid, being a professional pianist herself, can spot the problems immediately and efficiently help me correct and improve on it. Her mechanism in piano playing really helped me advance my skills as well as my expressiveness in performance. Her deep love to music and her passion into teaching truly benefits students who study under her.
To me, Anahid is much more than a piano teacher. She is a dear friend to talk to, a guidance in music, and a mentor who offers great pep talk.

originalText.text: Anahid is an excellent instructor and is very talented.  I am a beginner adult and started taking lessons with her this past  year. I have very little musical  knowledge/experience, but I always had an interest since childhood. Her methods of teaching are very effective. She not only teaches the content but also is attentive and provides key feedback in terms of technique.  I walk away from each class learning something new.   Also being a beginner adult, I truly appreciate her patience and kind personality.  She also takes the time to get to know her students, which is very nice.  I am excited to continue my lessons this year and look forward to working with Anahid!

originalText.text:
I had lessons with Anahid for about a year. I used to play as a child and teenager and then picked it up again as an adult years later. Anahid made sure to re-establish a solid technical foundation. She helped me extend and develop my playing on technical as well as other musical levels. She put a great focus on interpretation and artistic expression. She also has perfect pitch, which helps detecting even the slightest wrong notes ;)
I also met other teachers in her studio, everyone was very friendly, I played at the summer recital which was a fantastic experience. I would recommend her to anyone who wants to learn the piano, beginner or advanced.

originalText.text: Anahid is an excellent piano instructors. Probably one of the best piano teachers I have taken. I have played piano for 10 and everyday coming to Anahid 's class, I still am learning new variations and techniques which enable me to move forward. She is comfortable working with students at any level and is fun to spend time with. I highly suggest Anahid to any student who interested in learning or sharpening their piano skills.
